function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for green spaces as a mitigating factor for SARS-CoV-2 infection","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Include green spaces in urban planning and design, conduct further research on the impact of green spaces on infection rates","Technologies":"GIS mapping, urban planning software, epidemiological modeling","People":"Urban planners, architects, public health officials","Owner":"Urban planning departments, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited data on the relationship between green spaces and infection rates across multiple waves of the pandemic","Impact":"Inability to assess the long-term effectiveness of green spaces in reducing infection rates","Mitigation":"Collect data on infection rates and green space exposure across different pandemic waves, conduct longitudinal studies to track the impact of green spaces on infection rates","Technologies":"Data collection tools, statistical analysis software, longitudinal study methods","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the characteristics and optimal buffer distance of green space exposure for reducing SARS-CoV-2 infection rates","Impact":"Lack of clear guidelines for incorporating green spaces into urban environments to mitigate infection risk","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed studies to determine optimal green space characteristics and buffer distances for infection risk reduction, develop guidelines for urban planning based on the findings","Technologies":"Remote sensing, spatial analysis tools, urban design software","People":"Urban planners, architects, public health officials","Owner":"Urban planning departments, public health agencies"}]}
